name: Multidimensional Parkour
description:
Multidimensional Parkour (MDP) is a fast-paste parkour jump and run game with various movement mechanics, the aim of each level is to reach the goal, i.e. a portal leading to the next level, as quickly as possible. The game has a build in Timer to track your fastest time to finish a level.
This Game is a student project from me and i dont know if or how much im gonna work on it in the future.
But because i really liked the game so far i decided to upload it here. If you have any ideas or tips on what i could do better or change pls let me know in the comments.

Also if you enjoy my game feel free to post your best level finish times in the comments!
